Kyenkyen Bi Adi Mawu

Posted to Mottr.am by
Jack
on 24 August 2009. Tags: ghana highlife

Download

A great low-tempo highlife song by the late, wonderfully-named Ghanaian singer Alhaji K. Frimpong. This was his big hit. Via Awesome Tapes From Africa.
